    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="84254" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="84254" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.23</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="695">695</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="84"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>The Omniscient Mr Thompson</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. <b>The Omniscient Mr Thompson</b> was launched in 2023. Top notes are Lavender, elemi and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Orris, Black Pepper and Geranium; base notes are Vanilla, Sesame and Oak. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="84254"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89059960754954; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 3.25rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.84529946162075; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.390.jpg" style="width: 3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Elemi-390.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>elemi</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.91.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pink-Pepper-91.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pink Pepper</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.101.jpg" style="width: 4.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orris-Root-101.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Orris</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.78843493436923; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.158.jpg" style="width: 2.725rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pepper-158.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Black Pepper</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.21.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Geranium-21.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Geranium</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.9567189380854; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.290.jpg" style="width: 3.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sesame-290.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sesame</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85480333137226; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.326.jpg" style="width: 3.05rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Oak-326.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Oak</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="84254"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='6c9a22ecbfe9df174176fc2a2d6dce54237' slotpayload='{"ct":"JmDBMkjxEu6He1NKEiH8wMJKifGdZVAKHjIKR5pYfOfYfzdm0iZt0H1eFVxm9r07giDBXZwsUF+1+2IfFwzYcHdLzDv3f+XUDMLjCPpJLJ+B60GDIdG1H5E3iYAHEwajDZO0mTQlL9tP7NWKtphdYevv6Zl37O\/emWEJ1+Am9ECHnrh4NJWasy\/QhCVZeDWkUd3\/+o+LIsfy1rHkwRDDtAPbYGTsLqm9rZw7zRtROeq0YJENRCZIKz5Z8vb6kZKZrXHNcSEwpa71r0QvNPgJKlyqqfDHzjYnySTYt++siTBR8hjLrMR8hQGNpFMjatCH3koDvVJ6cmWVGu+Xr8idLw==","iv":"8b9d2841aaaa8e6a5579c1c379d15e46","s":"d5a4ce8e52dd80b0"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331754" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="distictic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1877069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="distictic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331754ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331754" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1877069">distictic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this is at most 30% similar to dior homme, it does its own thing, opens up quite spicy, then the powdery orris emerges. The sesame milk note in here is what makes this, making it very creamy as it dries down, giving this sandalwood accord feel. It also adds this bready aspect that makes this gourmand-ish to an extent.<br />
<br />
 Overall I think its phenomenal and it will be my first Penhaligons!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2331754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2331754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; orris with a subtle hint of vanilla, but something in the dry down smells a little stinky on me. i preferred how it smelled within a few seconds of spraying it on skin and how it smelled on a tester strip compared to how its drying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The vanilla and orris blends so well with the lavender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2242737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2242737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237426" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fogwalker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821659"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.821659.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fogwalker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mauboussin/Mauboussin-Pour-Lui-in-Black-30138.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30138.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mauboussin Pour Lui in Black"title="Mauboussin Pour Lui in Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237426ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237426" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821659">Fogwalker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 03:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why, oh why, do Penhaligon's ALWAYS produce the most incredible perfumes with the most disappointing longevity / sillage, with maybe one or two exceptions?<br />
This house has been doing this for years now and it's so annoying.<br />
I know I'm not the only one who thinks this. Many of my frag-friends say exactly the same thing.<br />
There is no way I would ever spend the amount of money they now charge for one of their two-second-wonder perfumes these days.<br />
I have resorted to buying dupes of Penhaligon's fragrances, and although they're not identical (but a good 85% similar), their longevity is immeasurably better than the originals.<br />
They really need to up their game.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2237426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2237426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2226359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2226359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sword luvs u"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200824"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2200824.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sword luvs u" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200824">Sword luvs u</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im trying to get into niche perfumes and I heard this brand was well regarded for a good reason. I bought this at a duty free store in Qatar after sampling it. Initially the opening reminds me a lot of jpgs le male le parfum just a bit less spicy and better blended. The dry down is  a nice subtle vanilla, powdery, and lavender scent. IMO very similar the the original le male DNA but a lot higher quality and better blended. Although its comparable to le male id say its a very unique smelling fragrance. Not very loud I wouldnt wear this going out to a party or club. If it werent for the price this would easily be my go to everyday scent super versatile and easy to wear in all seasons considering this scent is on the softer more intimate side. Overall this is probably the best scent in my growing collection its something about how unique it is and Im a fan of the le male DNA so for me its a no brainer. Id say this is a safe blind buy (but for this kind of price Id suggest sampling if you can) very mass appealing and even if you dont love this scent Im sure youd appreciate the quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I don't find this very masculin at all- should be classed as Unisex!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2220772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2220772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/491405">mrjohn12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 12:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TOMT solves a few fragrance wants I had on my list.  The aromatic peppery opening is serene, calming, meditative similar to Initios Rehab.  And if I purchase this, then the juxtaposition of bitter almost black tea (?) and sweet gourmand means I dont need to purchase Atelier Des Ors Blue Madeilene.  And finally, the buttery and nutty dry down, which very lightly clings to clothing the morning after, may help me get over missing out on Celines Black Tie before it sold out everywhere.  This fragrance is a winner.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2203127"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2203127#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178397" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132381">Bnknowsfrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 00:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favourite penhaligons fragrance oat and I will tell you why. I can amazing this fragrance being worn by a mature man in his 20s and it is a really mature iris scent with a wonderful gourmand-like dry down because of the vanilla and woody notes. I personally think for the price tag your getting your moneys worth for the smell but the performance is quite disappointing for the 235 your paying. Overall this is a great fragrance and my favourite penhaligons.<br />
<br />
Longevity 7/10<br />
Sillage 7/10<br />
Smell 9.4/10<br />
Bottle 9.9/10<br />
How much I would pay. 75ml: 180</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2178397"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2178397#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2164501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2164501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2157770" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coffeeandscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1383663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coffeeandscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2157770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2157770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383663">Coffeeandscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 06:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a gorgeous perfume made with high quality ingredients, everything smells natural and not synthetic. This is so well blended, not one note completely sticks out from the rest except maybe vanilla. I get a beautiful rich vanilla mixed with lavender and iris, the sesame and wood make it creamy and also add a little depth. . Overall its a comforting experience to wear, there are no sharp notes, it is very smooth. Moderate projection but very long lasting. I only have a 10 ML and Im savoring it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2157770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2157770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148059" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emile van Niekerk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2050153"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emile van Niekerk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148059ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148059" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2050153">Emile van Niekerk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing creamy floral iris scent i get a good 6-8 hours on my skin and okish projection its a beautiful scent that can be worn all year round a warning is that it does lean more feminine because of all the florals still a incredible scent and my verry first niche</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2148059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2148059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aromaarchitectusa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1863748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1863748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aromaarchitectusa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1863748">aromaarchitectusa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really, really like this - especially the creamy, powdery orris, the smooth vanilla, and the luxurious, sweet sesame. Its yummy, chic, elegant, and can be a signature scent. So, overall, quite a rave review from me. The performance leaves something to be desired - I get a few hours but nothing close to eternal. If you're looking at other Penhaligon fragrances, this is incredibly similar to Eau the Audacity, so make sure not to buy both like your silly narrator did! Oh well , they're both delicious and I'll use them generously (as it takes many sprays from each to get something out of them). Mr. Thompson can be worn year round and is unisex leaning masculine. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2145420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2145420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129484" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amnebe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amnebe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floral-Street/Wild-Vanilla-Orchid-47212.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47212.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wild Vanilla Orchid"title="Wild Vanilla Orchid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213">amnebe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is very heavy. It reminds me a lot of La Vie Est Belle. I tried them back to back, and it's not quite as sweet or floral as LVEB and not as headache-inducing. I think I'd choose Mr. Thompson over the two, although it only lasts about 3 hours. It's hard to say what I smell in this one because everything blends together so well. Because it reminds me so much of LVEB, it seems more feminine-leaning to me. I don't get the masculine gentleman vibes everyone else is talking about. Because of the orris, I expected it to be powdery, but it's not. It's just okay. I don't see myself reaching for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2129484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2129484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127323" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Goldena35"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1807650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Goldena35" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gritti/Duchessa-63729.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63729.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Duchessa"title="Duchessa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807650">Goldena35</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 07:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy this. This is my 3rd time wearing it and I like it more each time. Opens with alot of pepper. I love that the sesame comes through and brings this toasty nutty element. The lavender bring a clarity to the overall scent that it needs. The orris is strong and for me is the main player with vanilla playing a background role. It does lean a bit masculine (I think its marketed for men) but I dont care. Very balanced perfume with alot of character. Really beautiful on a chilly rainy afternoon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2127323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2127323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109572" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 03:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very balanced , bold and masculine fragrance. It's like a classic remade into a modern style . It has a grey suit , evening  , gentleman, barbershop type of scent . Staying true to the portraits collection it has that thick texture to it. <br />
At the top all the notes are pretty strong . Elemi being the strongest . But there's a touch of freshness. After that the orris vanilla and oak become the strongest notes with the black pepper kind of keeping all the notes in check . The vanilla , black pepper and oak mix gives a slight cinnamon note out. I think this is a great evening , date night, formal fragrance . Performance it's pretty good. It won't project for very long but it stays on the skin pretty strong for hours . It projected about an arms length for maybe an hour . But stayed on the skin strong for about 4 hours . Eventually faded about 8 hours later . I'm my opinion this is the best masculine fragrance from the portraits collection. <br />
If you are looking for a gentleman, barbershop , subtle woody vanilla fragrance this is totally worth a look . I really like this but it's just so expensive. Especially for something I'll maybe use once a month . Maybe one day they will make a 1.0-1.7oz bottle .<br />
Scent - 8.5<br />
Complexity - 8.5<br />
Quality - 9.0<br />
Performance - 8.0<br />
Bottle - 10.0</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2109572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2109572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Gourmand, clean, and smooth like butter. Not exactly wowing on my skin but rather par for the course as far as the portraits series go. If anything it has a rather "stealthy" characteristic to it. Omniscient indeed Mr. Thompson</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2096750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2096750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094125" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tembacat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814578.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tembacat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Chipmunk-67998.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67998.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chipmunk"title="Chipmunk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814578">Tembacat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 03:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A creamy iris rather than powdery: sweet, sophisticated, and comforting. I feel this is an ultimate unisex scent: it doesn't lean feminine or masculine to my nose. Another commenter said they get waffle cone from it, and I sort of agree, I assume from the vanilla. I love this and am considering a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2094125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2094125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2089492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077849" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chowder.man"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chowder.man" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958462">chowder.man</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dior Homme Intense was my first iris fragrance, and I loved it. I thought I loved iris, but after smelling several other iris fragrances, I was starting to think that nothing could match Dior Homme Intense's iris, but this, this here...this is it. It's DHI + vanilla and it's so fucking good It's just as sexy as DHI, but more creamy and delicious. DHI is a better bang for your buck, but this is the better smell to me.<br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2077849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2077849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2074553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2074553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2070185" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elli LDN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2028060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elli LDN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2070185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2070185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028060">Elli LDN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-22">02/22/24 02:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Female wearer of Dior Homme Intense and I get the similarities. I Became mesmerized by Mr Thompson the moment a great seller suggested it to me. It is a statement scent that exudes confidence, prepare to receive many compliments.<br />
<br />
As I can't justify the price for the full bottle (and the cap is also not to my liking, sorry elephant lovers) I just bought the 35 mini travel option instead in stores. Keeping this for sophisticated winter evenings, a night at the theatre, a winter dinner, opera/cinema night. I absolutely adore it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2070185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2070185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068962" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skipcon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skipcon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Absolute-43040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Absolute"title="Gucci Guilty Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791">Skipcon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 23:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Currently wearing this one as a sample. <br />
<br />
It's nice, definitely along the same vibes as Dior Homme. HOWEVER. People are making out the DNA is like 90% similar. It's not. Just for clarification. It's the distinct iris. I'd say for me it's more along the lines of Gris Charnel. <br />
<br />
Is it a good perfume? Yes. I like it. The sesame note is great and really complements the iris with this composition. For me, a lot of the portraits are quite underwhelming and this one steps away from that and is one of the better ones in my view. <br />
<br />
My assessment of penhaligons is that they're moving away from the more polarising scents and sticking to mainstream tested and done combinations, such as the new AluHa fragrance (which I also got a sample of)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2068962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2068962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055975" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055975" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ksj_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ksj_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Instant-de-Guerlain-pour-Homme-52.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"title="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055975ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055975" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640">Ksj_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lovely Dior Homme DNA spin-off and not worth the price tag. So, grab yourself a 10ML and save yourself money if you really love this. <br />
<br />
<br />
Side note:<br />
<br />
This scent profile has been recreated a dozen times over. It's a beautiful iris/orris scent that's redundant to have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2055975"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2055975#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052479" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052479" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="koxayous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1303753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="koxayous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052479ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052479" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2052479"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2052479#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2048209" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="djigoio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1488846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1488846.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="djigoio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Essential-Parfums/Bois-Imperial-64338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Imprial"title="Bois Imprial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2048209ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2048209" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1488846">djigoio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Creamy Iris. I don't really get a super noticeable vanilla note, but more of a caramelised one. It develops from this to a more spiced mode (Cardamom).<br />
<br />
Makes me feel it's made for formal situations. Something nobility would wear in the past days.<br />
<br />
Sadly longevity is not that good on skin for me. Used for a couple of days in the cold and maybe reached the 5-6 hours. Stays on clothes longer though.<br />
<br />
Is it similar to DH Parfum? From someone who has it as signature for formal ocassions, Hell no.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2048209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2048209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lovely. Started off very very spicy and peppery on my skin personally. Then dried to an almost gris charnel (iris, fig, cardamom) smelling bomb. Very good fragrance and decent longevity from Penhaligons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2043871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2043871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2042386" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coffeeandscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1383663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coffeeandscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2042386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2042386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383663">Coffeeandscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-26">01/26/24 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I smell this I envision the color purple. Purple iris and a soothing sweet purple lavender. You also get a slight savory/ nutty note from the sesame. But everything is blended so well it comes together as a soft, comforting milkshake of vanilla, powdery iris, sesame and a little pink pepper sitting on a woodsy base. This can definitely be worn at night before bed or any time you want to be cozy. Soft projection and subtle lasting power.  It could also be a signature scent (if you can afford it lol)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2042386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2042386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032127" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032127" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thewho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857053"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1857053.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thewho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032127ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032127" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857053">thewho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-15">01/15/24 22:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SOTD The Omniscient Mr Thompson by Penhaligons  2/5<br />
<br />
I wanted to love this perfume at it was highly recommended by David at Scent Bar, but it just wasnt a hit on my skin. Based on the notes it should be a 5/5 for me since it is some of my favorite notes made into one. <br />
<br />
The first spray is lavender and pepper which is interesting then unpleasant. And then the geranium takes over and makes me dislike the scent. Maybe on another persons skin it would be delightful, but its not love for me. Leans more masculine. It does not remind me of Dior Homme, Iris Torrefie, Herod or Shalimar Iris at all. <br />
<br />
Reviewed is based on a free sample from scent bar. Wore at home.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2032127"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2032127#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2028075" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alibaba40"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832969"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alibaba40" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Basso-75927.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75927.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Basso"title="Basso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2028075ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2028075" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832969">Alibaba40</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 15:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must confess that I purchased this based upon the cap/elephant head.  I also have several of the other Penhaligon's Portraits Collection scents and love most all of them. However, this one disappoints a little bit with the longevity. I also dont get much vanilla but I do get the sesame and some of the other notes. I really wanted this one to be good. Absolutely smells better on my husband than on my skin.  Its hard to leave this review, as I think Penhaligon's Portraits Collection is absolutely genius, both in marketing and in development of the fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2028075"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2028075#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017660" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The nutty sesame note is the best. I love this with a little caramel lotion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2017660"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2017660#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015652" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Minzynguyen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359981"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1359981.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Minzynguyen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/D-ORSAY/Flower-Lust-96258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flower Lust"title="Flower Lust"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); I appreciate it if you can share with me. Thanks!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2015652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2015652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
