padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/172373">ricarvic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Omniscient Mr. Thompson is the Penhaligons approach to DHI and VUI scent profile (more similar to Valentino than Dior). I love both of the aforementioned perfumes, but Mr. Thompson is just a step above with its quality ingredients and its English sophistication!!! This is lovely in every possible way!! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2011448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2011448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009845" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spumyland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.189882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spumyland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maher-Olfactive/Santal-Auster-60618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Auster"title="Santal Auster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009845ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009845" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882">spumyland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-24">12/24/23 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first time I tested him he seemed interesting and the funniest character in the collection.  After trying it several times, I found it to be short on evolution and rather usual.  <br />
A vanilla that echoes the classic and retro with iris, lavender, and spicy elemi in the opening and a slightly boozy oak liqueur finish with hints of dessert and vanillin.  Soft and warm.  <br />
You can feel its nuances in the first five minutes but then its tired sweetness, despite it being soft to wear.  <br />
Suitable for winter evenings.  Better on a guy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2009845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2009845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008864" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpsottak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1460598.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpsottak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598">cpsottak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-23">12/23/23 10:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligons is my favorite house, and i love their portraits collection, this is another amazing fragrance thats not too strong and obnoxious! Very dynamic! So well blended too, you get the creamy iris and sweet vanilla with lots of depth, i love the dry down, such a smooth fragrance. As a fragrance collector, im so happy that the quality of the juice really reciprocates the quality of the bottle! The price is steep, but the exclusive luxury nature of the brand makes it worthwhile for me.<br />
<br />
Beware, a lot of fakes have been circulating the web of the portraits collection. Its best to buy from an authorized retailer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2008864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2008864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1855036">No6L&#039;Amoureux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this recently, I can see the DHI comparisons and I appreciate it as a lover of DHI. That said there are differences in the mid and base notes, which make this a standout on its own, so depending on where you sit with DHI don't let it sway you fully but it is worth trying. The cap is stunning too! <br />
<br />
I love Iris so I was keen to try it and now its on my wishlist. Wouldn't fork out 220 for it, I'll keep an eye on Vinted instead and get it cheaper lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2007352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2007352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Cant comment on performance as I can not bring myself to spraying this on myself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1995094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1995094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994375" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eppsie1018"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273055"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1273055.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eppsie1018" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273055">Eppsie1018</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get the DHP/DHI comparisons, however I get DIOR HOMME EAU up top. Once it hits mid. It's more DHI, but the cinnamon stands out and makes it a different fragrance. A Solid amount of vanilla and rum join the cinnamon for a fantastic drydown. I enjoy this fragrance! It sits closer to skin (more intimate) which is perfect for a date. I would wear this more often than DHP/DHI. This feels more elegant and mature</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1994375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1994375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1992100" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1992100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1992100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-04">12/04/23 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So many people want to berate Penhaligons for this collection, these characters and stories and such but I actually think they're good natured, well packaged and the design is always on point, but most of all they're good fun. Not so much for me but I've been to the penhaligons store and seen the glee with which the staff recount the marketing blurb and the positive response from the punters, so I say live and let live. (Yes I'm not a totally grumpy bastard!) It's better customer service and enthiasm than most luxury department store SA's can muster, I mean usually they just stand beside you and ask 'Do you like it? I think it's really nice, Do you want to get that?' displaying zero knowledge of the brand or willingness to engage. <br />
<br />
I do understand the critisism, as I alluded to to above, I don't particulaly connect with this line myself and even less so as it sprawls further and further out and I get that the worst of this line are a million miles from the staples which Penhaligons built it's brand upon. However, every so often there's a decent one and this is definitely one of the better ones I've tried. <br />
<br />
Mr Thompson is basically a powdery, classic, iris perfume with elegant top notes and a sort of feel of fleshy, gourmand inflected, leather. The formula immediately had me thinking of Dior Homme parfum, in that there's an exaggerated heft to this vibe, not very diffuse, more of a low lying skin thing, being a 'niche' brand and as such expensive, this was probably the intent. Wearing it today I got some of that nutty aspect of Valentino Uomo but in truth that was fleeting and if I'm studying this perfume formula down to it's minutia, I'd say that this rides a middleground between Uomo &amp; Homme. But does that mean it's 'unique'??? (the word the lady in the Penhaligons shop said to me)  No. Not really, I don't find it as elegant as dior homme original it's more like the INtense or Parfum in that regard but there's more of a tonka prominant thing in the base and the way it's clinging to my clothes has a slightly off kilter, wheaty sort of vibe. It's a lovely collection of notes and accords that opening pink pepper is lovely and it gets all fleshy with orris right quick like, all of which compliment one another to conjure that luxurious leather thing, what maybe lets this down is also like many of this collection, the top end is loaded with intrigue and the base is just going through the motions, but don't get me wrong it's a stong outing and if ever you were compelled to buy one of these for the stopper alone I'd say the Omniscient Mr Thompson would be that one. The elephant head is massive!!!! like three times the size of some of the more modest heads in this line, it's massive dumbo ears and tusks are fucking cool, let's face it, glad the juice somewhat lives up to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1992100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1992100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Still testing. Of course its not the same as DHI but the iris note is similar. This is as much a vanilla as it is an iris. Its extremely beautiful and addictive! More thoughts to come soon </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1986015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1986015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1982489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1982489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1969128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1969128" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DacontaE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1375930"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1375930.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DacontaE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1969128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1969128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1375930">DacontaE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-05">11/05/23 06:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite being omniscient, Mr.Thompson is quite the curious creature. To some he is this beautiful Iris beast, powdery and subtle. To others he is a gourmand king, vanilla and sesame ruling over all. For me he is the latter and I love him for it. On my skin Mr.Thompson is a warm vanilla and sesame bomb, garnering me compliments and the oh so loved 'What are you wearing?' well after 6 hours of wear time. I was originally attracted to Mr.Thompson for the cap alone as I love elephants, but I'm glad I love the inside as much as I love the outside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1969128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1969128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1968985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/929673">Theodorapo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-05">11/05/23 02:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>first things first this is Not even close to DHP but its a really nice fragrance with similar vibes thats worth to try or buy! Average projection, sillage on my skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1968985"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1968985#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966090" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maliken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maliken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503">Maliken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-01">11/01/23 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find most of the Portrait's collection underwhelming, but Mr. Thompson is absolute fire. My personal favorite from the line so far.<br />
<br />
It has that distinct opening of lavender, pepper and elemi that's straight from Viktor &amp; Rolf Spicebomb (EdT). Buttery and powdery orris root joins the blend, reminiscent of fragrances like Amouage Reflection Man until it all settles on a rich, creamy base of sesame milk and vanilla to give it that slight gourmand edge to round off the aromatics and spice.<br />
<br />
It smells elegant, dapper and quite inviting. This fragrance would go well with a slightly dressed up look and shines during the colder seasons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1966090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1966090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1963432" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hassankhalid91"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1467534"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1467534.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hassankhalid91" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ajwad-Pink-to-Pink-89766.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89766.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ajwad Pink to Pink"title="Ajwad Pink to Pink"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1963432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1963432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1467534">hassankhalid91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-29">10/29/23 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>just tried yesterday and i dont like much... <br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1963432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1963432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1961015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1961015" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ahmosenefertari"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/636930"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ahmosenefertari" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1961015ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1961015" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); Much less spicy, smoky, but very similar DNA</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1961015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1961015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1958834" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1958834" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fourleafedrover8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1762926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fourleafedrover8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1958834ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1958834" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762926">fourleafedrover8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 06:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like my dad in the 1990s and it took me a minute to realize that what I was smelling was something akin to the original Old Spice formula. Woodsy vanilla base, peppery-geranium middle, spice in the top note.... it's all there. It's very nostalgic. Warm, spicy rather than clean, and definitely a dad scent. It's not for me and I wouldn't find it sexy on a man, but I can see the value. However, there are soooo many other colognes that smell like this rather than pay for that wild PH price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1958834"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1958834#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945853" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="April in Paris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="April in Paris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Omniscient Mr Thompson"title="The Omniscient Mr Thompson"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645940">April in Paris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 16:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled this in store, but it was sold out.  It opens peppery, floral and slightly sweet, layered with sesame, and dries down to a soft vanilla sesame milk.  Also has powdery notes.  It's blended very well.  This doesn't have longevity and sits close to the skin for me.  I like it, but not sure if I will get a full bottle given the performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1945853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1945853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1944144" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yalcin05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408251.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yalcin05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-Parfum-89988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood Parfum"title="Oud Wood Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1944144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1944144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408251">Yalcin05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested it today and Ill tell you Im going to buy a full bottle as soon as the store has it back in stock.<br />
<br />
It opens with a nice floral pungent thing.. dries down to the most beautiful iris perfume Ive encountered. It reminds you of iris and for sure more perfumes have iris, but the vanilla combo, and that pungent opening is different. Somehow the drydown is very smooth and very very luxurious. <br />
<br />
DHI is very pungent and keeps pungent, this isnt. The drydown is really like the note breakdowns are vanilla sesame and the iris that keeps everything so buttery smooth and powdery. As a man I enjoy this and its definitely unisex. The price is overpriced for sure, since you can get similar vibes and scents for much cheaper, but as someone who smells everything intens and love the small details, i love this and Im waiting for my bottle! And ooh the performance is good indeed.. stays for a while 8 hours and projects fine. <br />
<br />
9/10 for me! What I wanted more? Not sure but I think maybe some leather in the drydown? As it almost comes over as leather sometimes.. it could have been bit more stronger for me ( that facet). But believe me this is very close to perfection, and the best iris for sure!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1944144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1944144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Only thing Ill add is that the performance on this is very very good, and I am a performance nut. I honestly feel that this could be the most beautiful iris vanilla frag out there. Very soft, intoxicating</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1943604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1943604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1940128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Vanila is present all the way, i get lavender in the opening, the iris is buttery and peppery. Warm, charming, expertly blended. I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1940128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1940128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923600" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923600" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thanasis_87k"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thanasis_87k" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-41698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking"title="Viking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923600ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923600" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361577">Thanasis_87k</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me is a rather subtle perfume. It is gentle, inoffensive. You get a sweet sesame note. Could be worn as an office perfume in my opinion, as is more suited for daylight activities.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1923600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1923600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918527" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911303" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luca Lucarelii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766476"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1766476.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luca Lucarelii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766476">Luca Lucarelii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It lasts about 6 hours on my skin with a moderate projection for the first hour. This unisex scent is universally appealing. This is a fragrance for cooler days and I prefer The Blazing Mr Sam to The Omniscient Mr Thompson. With the perfumes with which it is compared here, The Omniscient Mr Thompson is fragrantly better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1911303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1911303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910737" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amanda0727"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amanda0727" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910737ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910737" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049">amanda0727</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-24">08/24/23 18:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm so happy it's a love for me! I can see how some people say it smells like Dior Homme Intense but only in the beginning. I also have Guerlain's Iris Torrefie and this does not smell like it. Very peppery, and i feel it's quite lactonic as well, and i definitely get the sesame too. Sweeter than i expected, the dry down almost reminds me of sweetened condensed milk. If I am being honest I was gonna buy this regardless of the scent due to my love of elephants . This is definitely NOT for Everyone! The pepper and sesame can be overbearing for some. Unisex leaning fem IMO</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1910737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1910737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; </div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1969128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1969128" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DacontaE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1375930"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1375930.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DacontaE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1969128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1969128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1375930">DacontaE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-05">11/05/23 06:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite being omniscient, Mr.Thompson is quite the curious creature. To some he is this beautiful Iris beast, powdery and subtle. To others he is a gourmand king, vanilla and sesame ruling over all. For me he is the latter and I love him for it. On my skin Mr.Thompson is a warm vanilla and sesame bomb, garnering me compliments and the oh so loved 'What are you wearing?' well after 6 hours of wear time. I was originally attracted to Mr.Thompson for the cap alone as I love elephants, but I'm glad I love the inside as much as I love the outside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1969128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1969128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910737" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amanda0727"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amanda0727" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910737ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910737" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049">amanda0727</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-24">08/24/23 18:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm so happy it's a love for me! I can see how some people say it smells like Dior Homme Intense but only in the beginning. I also have Guerlain's Iris Torrefie and this does not smell like it. Very peppery, and i feel it's quite lactonic as well, and i definitely get the sesame too. Sweeter than i expected, the dry down almost reminds me of sweetened condensed milk. If I am being honest I was gonna buy this regardless of the scent due to my love of elephants . This is definitely NOT for Everyone! The pepper and sesame can be overbearing for some. Unisex leaning fem IMO</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1910737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1910737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220772" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Printeza7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Printeza7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Rose-Anonyme-16013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Anonyme"title="Rose Anonyme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220772ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220772" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36097">Printeza7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 19:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a woman and I love this!! Oh my, I was going to pass it to my husband but neah a keeper in my  collection! I don't find this very masculin at all- should be classed as Unisex!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2220772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2220772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107478" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aleauv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/716019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.716019.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aleauv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atkinsons/Oud-Save-The-Queen-22057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Save The Queen"title="Oud Save The Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/716019">Aleauv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 21:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is clean, balanced, comforting and genderless, is giving me lavander soap and baked cookies, sounds awful but it works , you'll get noticed  .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2107478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2107478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1992100" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1992100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1992100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-04">12/04/23 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So many people want to berate Penhaligons for this collection, these characters and stories and such but I actually think they're good natured, well packaged and the design is always on point, but most of all they're good fun. Not so much for me but I've been to the penhaligons store and seen the glee with which the staff recount the marketing blurb and the positive response from the punters, so I say live and let live. (Yes I'm not a totally grumpy bastard!) It's better customer service and enthiasm than most luxury department store SA's can muster, I mean usually they just stand beside you and ask 'Do you like it? I think it's really nice, Do you want to get that?' displaying zero knowledge of the brand or willingness to engage. <br />
<br />
I do understand the critisism, as I alluded to to above, I don't particulaly connect with this line myself and even less so as it sprawls further and further out and I get that the worst of this line are a million miles from the staples which Penhaligons built it's brand upon. However, every so often there's a decent one and this is definitely one of the better ones I've tried. <br />
<br />
Mr Thompson is basically a powdery, classic, iris perfume with elegant top notes and a sort of feel of fleshy, gourmand inflected, leather. The formula immediately had me thinking of Dior Homme parfum, in that there's an exaggerated heft to this vibe, not very diffuse, more of a low lying skin thing, being a 'niche' brand and as such expensive, this was probably the intent. Wearing it today I got some of that nutty aspect of Valentino Uomo but in truth that was fleeting and if I'm studying this perfume formula down to it's minutia, I'd say that this rides a middleground between Uomo &amp; Homme. But does that mean it's 'unique'??? (the word the lady in the Penhaligons shop said to me)  No. Not really, I don't find it as elegant as dior homme original it's more like the INtense or Parfum in that regard but there's more of a tonka prominant thing in the base and the way it's clinging to my clothes has a slightly off kilter, wheaty sort of vibe. It's a lovely collection of notes and accords that opening pink pepper is lovely and it gets all fleshy with orris right quick like, all of which compliment one another to conjure that luxurious leather thing, what maybe lets this down is also like many of this collection, the top end is loaded with intrigue and the base is just going through the motions, but don't get me wrong it's a stong outing and if ever you were compelled to buy one of these for the stopper alone I'd say the Omniscient Mr Thompson would be that one. The elephant head is massive!!!! like three times the size of some of the more modest heads in this line, it's massive dumbo ears and tusks are fucking cool, let's face it, glad the juice somewhat lives up to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1992100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1992100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="84254" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

Ultimately not worth it for the price </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2275741"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2275741#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032127" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032127" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thewho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857053"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1857053.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thewho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032127ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032127" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857053">thewho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-15">01/15/24 22:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SOTD The Omniscient Mr Thompson by Penhaligons  2/5<br />
<br />
I wanted to love this perfume at it was highly recommended by David at Scent Bar, but it just wasnt a hit on my skin. Based on the notes it should be a 5/5 for me since it is some of my favorite notes made into one. <br />
<br />
The first spray is lavender and pepper which is interesting then unpleasant. And then the geranium takes over and makes me dislike the scent. Maybe on another persons skin it would be delightful, but its not love for me. Leans more masculine. It does not remind me of Dior Homme, Iris Torrefie, Herod or Shalimar Iris at all. <br />
<br />
Reviewed is based on a free sample from scent bar. Wore at home.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="2032127"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=2032127#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995094" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Olgita"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710321"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1710321.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Olgita" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995094ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995094" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710321">Olgita</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is a dislike for me. I smell something very old and unpleasant smelling right from the opening. I think its the combination of orris, elemi, and pink pepper that gives this feeling (I can be wrong). Cant comment on performance as I can not bring myself to spraying this on myself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84254"comment_id="1995094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html?ccid=1995094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="84254" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="84254":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="84254" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
